p: The yield and DS of P3a and SP3a are summarized in Table 1. The yield of SP3a was 10.58 ± 0.42 mg/(100 mg dry weight P3). Due to degradation at relatively high temperatures during the sulfation process, yields are reduced ( Wang et al., 2010; Sandhya et al., 2018). This is consistent with the prior investigation ( Liu et al., 2018).
